Interface StraasMediaCore.UiContainer

  • Enclosing class:

    public static interface StraasMediaCore.UiContainer

      ViewGroup getVideoContainer()

      Called when MediaBrowserCompat.ConnectionCallback.onConnected() is called or called when StraasMediaCore.setUiContainer(UiContainer) if StraasMediaCore.getMediaBrowser().
      void onMediaBrowserConnectionFailed()

    • Method Detail

      • getVideoContainer

        @NonNull
ViewGroup getVideoContainer()
        Returns:
        the container to generate non-ad video views.

      • getAdContainer

        @Nullable
ViewGroup getAdContainer()
        Returns:
        the container for ad.

      • onUnbind

        void onUnbind(StraasMediaCore client)
        Called when a new StraasMediaCore.UiContainer being set via StraasMediaCore.setUiContainer(UiContainer). You could unregister any MediaControllerCompat.Callback related to this StraasMediaCore.UiContainer

      • onMediaBrowserConnected

        void onMediaBrowserConnected(StraasMediaCore client)
        Called when MediaBrowserCompat.ConnectionCallback.onConnected() is called or called when StraasMediaCore.setUiContainer(UiContainer) if StraasMediaCore.getMediaBrowser().isConnected() return true.
